content: I really like this Grevan wax museum, this is my first visit to the wax museum, some wax statues here look very real, I was impressed. I had a great time with Einstein and Steve Jobs in the assault quiz room at this wax museum, and I enjoyed taking pictures with other celebrities like Alphasino, Brad Pitt, Macy and the Queen. There is also an exhibition area inside this wax museum, which is only for Korean drama stars and Korean pop singers, and overall it is a fun day experience. It is easy to find on Echiro Road near Myeongdong Mall! Madonna is welcoming you at the entrance! The museum is full of lifelike images, and Li Minxuan, Einstein, Park Xinhui, Liu Zaishi, Quan Zhilong, Kod Li Xia Xuan and Diana and other celebrity superstars photo, have fun!

I have always heard of Madame Tussauds wax museum before. I have seen it several times in Thailand, but in South Korea it is Grevin. Every wax statue is very realistic and lifelike. Many tourists will take pictures, but there are also some historical figures in South Korea. I don’t know it.

From international film and television stars, sports stars to leading figures, there are about 80 heavyweight wax figures. If the face of the photo person is deformed, it is probably my beauty. Hahaha, you can scan the code in an area to play the game with the ticket~ There are many stars around the exit on the first floor that cannot be bought outside, such as Li Minhao, Xuanbin, Quan Zhilong, Liu Zaishi, Jin Xiuxian, Zhang Genshuo, etc., so Gray Van Wax Museum often attracts many fans to come.

I remember that Madame Tussauds Wax Museum on Nanjing Road in Shanghai used to be my childhood memories, and this Gravan Wax Museum, also from Paris, France, opened its first and only wax museum in Asia in Seoul. Wax Museum is located not far from the city hall, and is also close to Mingdong Business Circle. In the wax museum, you can see Li Minho, Jin Xiuxian, Liu Zaishi, GD and other Korean pop stars at close range. The souvenir shop located at the exit of the first floor on the ground floor also sells the exclusive souvenirs of Korean stars such as Li Minho, Jin Xiuxian, Liu Zaishi and GD. After the tour, customers who want to have a rest can go to the cafe on the first floor to have a rest. There are spaghetti, pizza, covered meals and other catering options in the cafe. There will also be a lot of discounts and discounts if they hold wax museum admission tickets.

It's very close to the open cave. It's in the middle of the open cave and the city hall. Wax figures of international stars and leaders in Jackie Chan, Lee Minho, Kim Xiuxian, Liu Zaishi, GD, Jordan, Lang Lang, Obama and other fields can be seen at close range. Here you can lose to the exclusive surroundings of Korean stars. Experience shooting in front of Jordan and virtual flying. After the tour, if you want to have a rest, you can go to the cafe on the first floor to have a rest (there are delicious pasta, pizza, covered rice and other delicacies). You can also experience the process of making your own wax figure. It's an interesting experience.

The Paper Museum is located on 1st Street, Sai Chung-dong, Naka-ku, Seoul. It is a museum dedicated to the history of paper culture development. It has a collection of more than 5,000 pieces of paper culture and art.
